headline: Analyst Upgrade And Insider Signals Reframe SoFi’s Long Term Valuation
summary: Citizens upgraded SoFi Technologies (NasdaqGS:SOFI) to Outperform, describing the recent share price decline as technical and highlighting the company as a long term fintech compounder. J.P. Morgan analysts identified SoFi as their preferred fintech stock over PayPal, pointing to the company’s revenue and membership growth. Insider activity included buying by company insiders alongside news of a planned share sale by the vice chairman, drawing fresh attention to the stock. SoFi...
